abstract: General Electric has already sold off a baker’s dozen of units, including the plastics unit where two of its former chief executives once worked. And it is in the process of selling its appliances business, one of its oldest units and the birthplace of a slew of everyday household items.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has already sold off a baker’s dozen of units, including the plastics unit where two of its former chief executives once worked. And it is in the process of selling its appliances business, one of its oldest units and the birthplace of a slew of everyday household items.

headline.main: G.E. Needs to Sell More Businesses, Analyst Says
